name: (Pantheon|Edit App) Edit app positive [2.1.8 Edit application]
id: stories/pantheon/UserApps.story;(Pantheon|Edit App) Edit app positive [2.1.8 Edit application]

testSteps.description: (Pantheon|Edit App) Edit app positive [2.1.8 Edit application] #1: {appFormField=Application name, appValue=mamax-Appdf, detailName=Application Name, regression-pantheon=}

children.description: Given open Home page
Open page
And navigate to Pantheon LogIn page from Home page
And navigate to Pantheon User Account page from LogIn page
Given open my Apps page
And open Edit App Page for the first application
When clear field {Application name} on Edit App Page
And enter to the field {Application name} value {mamax-Appdf}
And save changes on Edit App Page
And the message {App Updated!} is displayed
And open my Apps page
And open Details tab on the application
Then {Application Name} have been applied on Edit App Page with value {mamax-Appdf}
(Pantheon|Edit App) Edit app positive [2.1.8 Edit application] #2: {appFormField=Redirect URI, appValue=https://oauth.ticketmaster.com, detailName=Callback URL, regression-pantheon=}
Given open Home page
Open page
And navigate to Pantheon LogIn page from Home page
And navigate to Pantheon User Account page from LogIn page
Given open my Apps page
And open Edit App Page for the first application
When clear field {Redirect URI} on Edit App Page
And enter to the field {Redirect URI} value {https://oauth.ticketmaster.com}
And save changes on Edit App Page
And the message {App Updated!} is displayed
And open my Apps page
And open Details tab on the application
Then {Callback URL} have been applied on Edit App Page with value {https://oauth.ticketmaster.com}

userStory.narrative:
In order to manage my Apps
As a user of Ticket Master Developer portal
I want to perform CRUD operations with my apps

title: (Pantheon|Edit App) Edit app positive [2.1.8 Edit application]

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given open my Apps page
And open Edit App Page for the first application
When clear field <appFormField> on Edit App Page
And enter to the field <appFormField> value <appValue>
And save changes on Edit App Page
And the message App Updated! is displayed
And open my Apps page
And open Details tab on the application
Then <detailName> have been applied on Edit App Page with value <appValue>
